About Me

I am a Full-Stack / Back-End Developer. I am currently working at Kuadran Technologies as a Full-Stack Developer. I have 3 years of working experience in designing, developing, testing, and maintaining over 10 software applications for dekstop, web and mobile.

DMS - Delivery Management System

Concrete delivery management application. This application facilitates business processes such as receiving concrete orders from customers - delivery scheduling, report generation, commission calculation, delivery and questionnaire calculation and etc.

This application runs on a windows desktop, using a connection to an online PostgreSQL database.
I joined the team for developing this application, have maintained, and added many features such as new reports, commission calculations, sending questionnaires. I deal directly with users to collect requriement, modify database, design feature, development, and publish.

Desktop C# PosgreSQL Maintain Add Feature

Portal GRC

Portal GRC is web-based applications and mobile applications that accommodate information and automate processes in the GRC department. This web application features Changes Management Form Online, Product catalogs, Mailing System, E-library, Document requests and permissions, Reporting creation and automation, and SOP management

This web application is made using C# with asp net core framework. This website contacts the web api which is in charge of processing the PostgreSQL database. The web API can also be accessed from the mobile application from xamarin which is made as a helper for this webiste application
I responsible to develop the app from design document and requirement given. design and creating DB and publishing the app to a server

Website C# ASP Net Core PosgreSQL Design DB & System Develop Publish

BiShare

Applications used for entrepreneurship development. This application is to accommodate entrepreneurs for business matching and pitching, business exhibitions, business promotions, buying and selling products and services, accommodating the results of commercialized PBL products.

This mobile application is made using Javascript framework for mobile react native, Expo. it uses firebase database for data storage. this is very useful for the chat feature
I responsible to develop the app from requirement given. create design document, and creating DB.

College Project Mobile Javascript React Native Firebase Realtime database Design DB & System Develop

Portal GRC Mobile

The GRC Portal is a mobile application that accommodates information and reports, this application is a companion application to the GRC portal. This mobile application displays Online Change Management Forms, documents and reporting

This mobile application is made using C# with xamarin framework with Asp net core as api, and PostgreSQL datbase.
I am responsible for developing the application from the given design documents and requirements. design and create DB and publish the app to the server

Mobile C# Xamarin PosgreSQL Design DB & System Develop Publish

Oniq PBB

Oniq PBB is an accounting application that runs on a desktop platform, this application is useful for recording accounting journals, reporting and other features made specifically for this application.

This desktop application was created using the C# programming language, and the PostgreSQL database.
I joined the team for developing this application, have maintained, and added many features such as new reports. I deal directly with users to collect requriement, modify database, design feature, development.

Desktop C# PosgreSQL Maintain Add Feature

Beton Link

Beton Link is a mobile application for ordering concrete online.

This mobile application was created using the C#, Xamarin framework and the PostgreSQL database.
I joined the team for developing this application, have maintained, and added many features such as new customer order proof, commission calculations, sending questionnaires. I deal directly with users to collect requriement, modify database, design feature, development, and publish.

Desktop C# PosgreSQL Maintain Add Feature
